Title: Two in the Box
Writer: Ron Weiner, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: The new and improved Pied Piper impresses Dinesh and Gilfoyle, but worries Richard; Jared and Erlich face housing issues; Gavin suggests a controversial move.
